meanings.definition: To deliberately destroy or damage property.
meanings.sent1: He vandalizes the park benches by scribbling on them.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti artist vandalizes public walls with spray paint.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon vandalizes the garden by digging up all the plants.
meanings.sent4: The storm vandalizes the coastline, eroding the cliffs over time.
meanings.sent5: The reckless driver vandalizes the mailbox by crashing into it.

meanings.sent1: She vandalizes her notebook by tearing out pages in frustration.
meanings.sent2: The vandals vandalize the historic building by spray painting graffiti on its walls.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy vandalizes the living room by chewing on the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The harsh weather vandalizes the crops, destroying the harvest.
meanings.sent5: The careless child vandalizes the sandcastle by stomping on it.
